com.sap.sxe.db

Class conn

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sap.sxe.db.conn

  • public abstract class conn
extends java.lang.Object
    Superclass for all connections in handled in the SCE and the SPE. Defines the type of a connection. Changes: 23.02.2000 tm db_modify_table can now expect null as query_pair parameter which means update all rows (no where condition).

      • db_read_table

        public res db_read_table(java.lang.String table,
                         boolean readFromBuffer,
                         sys_query_pair[] query_pair,
                         java.lang.String[] projection,
                         java.lang.String[] sorting)
        Selects data from the specified table.
        Parameters:
        readFromBuffer - indicates whether selection should read from buffer or bypass it The present default implementation ignores readFromBuffer. Subclasses should overwrite this method if bypassing buffer makes sense for the corresponding database connection

      • db_read_first_row

        public res db_read_first_row(java.lang.String table,
                             boolean readFromBuffer,
                             sys_query_pair[] query_pair,
                             java.lang.String[] projection,
                             java.lang.String[] sorting)
                      throws exc_database_error
        Selects one single row from the specified table.
        Parameters:
        readFromBuffer - indicates whether selection should read from buffer or bypass it The present default implementation ignores readFromBuffer. Subclasses should overwrite this method if bypassing buffer makes sense for the corresponding database connection
        sorting - Array of fields by which the selection has to be ordered If it is empty an arbitrary line satisfying the selection criteria is returned. Otherwise the according lines are sorted by the given fields and the resulting first line is returned.
        Throws:
        exc_database_error
